Topic.Title: I need help with this idea

Posts.EditableText:
I'm building a hacking simulation
Here's how the storyline goes
"In tech section they will be 
Cybersecurity and programming
Under cybersecurity well have the
Black hat and white hat
Blacks have the ability to build crew to attack empires and whites have the ability to defend empires and empires are built by programmers and they use in game cash to hire white hats to defend their empires from black hats"
But I need ideas on the interface.
